text: “obagē at (dænaṭa yuddha nokara) vaḷakvaminda, salātaya (sthīra vaśayen) iṭu karaminda, sakātaya gevaminda siṭinu” yayi kavurun haṭa kiyanu læbuvēda, ovunva (nabiyē!) oba duṭuvē nædda? yuddha karanu yayi ovunṭa niyōga karanu læbū viṭa, ovungen ek samuhayak nam, allāhṭa biya vannāk men, nætahot īṭat vaḍā væḍiyen minisunṭa biya vī “apagē deviyanē! æyi apa kerehi yuddhaya niyama karannē? tavat ṭika davasakaṭa (meya) kal dæmiya yutu novēda?”yi pævasūha. (meyaṭa nabiyē!) oba mesē pavasanu: “melova jīvitaya itāmat alpaya! kavurun (allāhṭa) biya vī kaṭayutu karannēda, ohuṭa paralova (jīvitaya)ma itāmat aganēya. (obagē pin aḍu kara hō pāpaya væḍi kara hō) oba ek anu pramāṇayakinvat aparādha karanu nolabannehuya”
